lender.name: Steve @ KivaFriends.org
lender.occupation: A company spanning New York State called Balkan
lender.loan_because:
It\'s more than a loan, it\'s more than a charity donation. It\'s a contribution that can help improve someone\'s life by taking a more involved approach. Not only does it help people escape the crushing weight of extreme poverty, but it promotes a cultural exchange, racial unity, respect for and equality of women, and is a fulfilling experience for all involved as partners in the business. Those receiving these loans also have a greater sense of self-worth, confidence, and accomplishment. All anyone ever wants in life is an opportunity--a chance to live, to dream of a future, to be comfortable, and microloans are a huge step towards that goal. I believe we may soon find that this just might be our best answer to slowly eradicating such rampant and extreme world poverty and the negative realities that are so often derived from it. Our optimism will translate to its success. I highly commend Kiva for their sympathetic and uplifting efforts. I look forward to spreading the message and encouraging others to participate in this new world concept. There is no better return on an investment then to know you helped give someone that single chance they so desire in life.
FLORENCE KALUUBA, a courageous and determined teacher located in Uganda, has devoted her time, effort, and life towards elevating the role of young girls, improving their self-confidence and self-perception, and empowering them to become positive productive members of their society. She has recently completed a loan through Kiva which she successfully used to improve the quality and capabilities of the school she founded called Mirembe Community College. She has seen over 500 students enroll and complete training within her school which is a testament to the impact her school is having and will continue to have. A grant fund is being considered in honor of her accomplishments at kivafriends.org, in order to help insure the continued success and growth of her school. Please feel free to take a few moments to read the journal updates on her loan page and the inspiring blog posted by a Kiva fellow who is volunteering in her region.
http://www.kiva.org/app.php?page=businesses&action=about&id=9970
http://fellowsblog.kiva.org/2007/12/11/mikembe-youth-development-project/
Stay tuned for progress on this effort at the following link:
http://www.kivafriends.org/index.php/topic,1492.0.html
Here are some pictures recently sent to KivaFriends by Florence, depicting her school and her students. http://www.kivafriends.org/index.php/topic,1492.msg19842.html#msg19842
lender.occupational_info: Visit www.kivafriends.org for all things Kiva and to meet some fantastic loaners. Its the most incredible forum you'll come across and we welcome all visitors and members. It will most definitely further enhance your personal loaning experience.

lender.occupational_info: I work for a geotechnical materials laboratory, specializing in road and bridge construction.

lender.name: ACo
lender.loan_because: Where am I but here with you

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: I know you need a helping hand to get started.\r\nOnce you are ok, then you can help others, too.\r\nWe all need to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I have saved all my life and now I can share some of what I saved with you.

lender.name: Sarah and Matt
lender.loan_because: It's easy and fun to do!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a stay at home mom and my husband is a merchant marine

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to provide people with the opportunity to help themselves in a way that is consistent with their natural socioeconomic setting to support a sustainable local economy.
lender.occupational_info: Develop business opportunities and make them successful.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I want my neighbors to be successful and in turn contribute further to their community.
lender.occupational_info: Gardener

lender.name: carsten
lender.loan_because:
I like to support entrepreneurial spirits wherever they may exist,but particularly in the developing part of the world. If there is anything I can do to help them improve their own living conditions, I consider that a true privilege. I'm totally amazed about the results and impact that a small investment can make.
Good luck to all of you.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell stocks.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Because this is just the most awesome idea I have heard of to reach out and make a differance. My hats of to the kiva crew.
lender.occupational_info: I live and work in a small community of about 50 people, in a remote Alaskan village. I work on keeping power going and keeping everyone fueled up. And try to spend as much time with my wonderful daughters as I possibly can.

lender.name: Lea Darrah
lender.loan_because: I have so much in my life to be thankful for and even though it is small, I can help others in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help schools raise money.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is the key to solving many of the problems of the world. Thanks to Kiva for providing us this wonderful venue.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired IBM Engineer devoted to breeding new flowers. You can see pictures of them on our website.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: Wanting to Pay forward ... Provide support & opportunity for those with interest and willingness, striving for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Self Employed, Proprietor of Boat Sales - New & Pre-Owned Boats. Beautiful North East Coast of United States.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It's a small thing to do for such a great return. I am glad that Kiva has made this so easy to do and make funds available for those in need.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I want to help people whenever I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that boats and buildings are safe.

lender.name: Engelbert
lender.loan_because: To respect people's initiatives for a better life and to provide them with help and support to achieve their dreams
lender.occupational_info: Stressful and exciting

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I respect the entrepreneurial spirit these individuals exhibit and want to do my part to foster their abilities.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a vice-president of a small trucking company.

lender.name: Murray & Joanna
lender.loan_because: I've long admired the microloan programs like Grameen Bank. Here's a chance to participate on a personal level.
lender.occupational_info: We promote a small business opportunity which can work for anyone with an entrepreneurial spirit and determination.

lender.name: kristina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference when I can

lender.name: benjamin
lender.loan_because: I\'d like to provide motivated individuals with the opportunity to improve the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an ecommerce business analyst. I help internet based ecommerce companies create websites that are user friendly and profitable. I am also an amateur photographer - I shoot weddings and events in the Seattle area.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: It lets me be a direct contributor to improving someone\'s life. It just doesn\'t get better than that.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a software company.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I believe that a \"grassroots\" approach is the best way to solve issues such as global poverty and inequality.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Social Studies Teacher who currently teaches International Studies, Economics and Psychology.

lender.name: Kenny
lender.loan_because: I saw a telecast on a local TV station, PBS, about micro-loans and it touched me. I wanted to help right away and have. Over the years I have heard the phase People Helping People and now it is true in my life. Thank you!
lender.occupational_info: Providing telephone service.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It is great that so little money can mean so much to others !
lender.occupational_info: I work for a pipeline company that provids butane and propane to the eastern part of the United States.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe in the individuals and appreciate their projects.
lender.occupational_info: Work in marketing to improve business strategy. I also create computer programs to make business operations more efficient.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: It empowers.
lender.occupational_info: Comics and guides.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky in my life. I believe everyone deserves a hand up -- no matter where you live. Hard work and willing hearts are appreciated!
lender.occupational_info: project manager aviation industry

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: what could be more satisfying then helping someone achieve their goals and ambitions?
lender.occupational_info: father and husband

lender.name: ben
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help, no matter where, even if your, rich or poor.
lender.occupational_info: Truck driver, from Canada (Edmonton,Alberta). worked both at home and in U.S.A. which was fun, but my kids wanted me home more often, so now I work closer to home which I enjoy.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are doing their best to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Making cars safer.

lender.name: Vernon
lender.loan_because: TO HELP OUT WHAT I CAN

lender.name: Benjon
lender.loan_because: I have a passion for trying to help make a difference in people\'s lives. Kiva is an excellent way for a person like myself to reach out to people in need all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large global technology consulting firm that helps large businesses all over the world with projects to make them more successful.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I am able to lend in amounts that are affordable for me. These small amounts have a big impact on the recipients which give them a chance for sustainability. Selecting who the money will go to also makes the contribution very personal, and I like that.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major airline company and a lot of what I do involves people on some level. Customers, colleagues, and business partners, I interact with many different people.

lender.name: SugarBear
lender.loan_because: I care and have been blessed.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Through the internet, I am able to loan funds to people througout the world so that they can improve their living standards, and that of their families. While the internet has been the source of many troubles, it is also the means through which these small miracles can be accomplished.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse on a medical surgery floor at Queen of the Valley Medical Center where we tend to the needs of people who have recently had surgery, or are about to do so. by giving bedside care, I am able not only to tend to the medical needs of my patients, but also their emotional and, in some cases, their spiritual needs. I consider it a privilege to be able to do these things for my fellow humankind. I am a liberal politically, and a Buddhist.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I have something to offer those who don't have much.

lender.name: Rick & Judy
lender.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do! A perfect use of the internet - and we love this organization!
lender.occupational_info: We remarket broadcast video, audio, film and electronic test equipment for leasing companies that has been returned from a lease.

lender.name: Katy&Scott
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a good reason not to

lender.name: Jordana & Cristina
lender.loan_because: It is an honor to be able to help others realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: We make movies!

lender.name: Sascha
lender.loan_because: I want to enable people to take their life into their own hands.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I am thrilled to be given this opportunity. This is one of the best ideas I've heard of in a very long time. This really is such a small little planet that we ALL call home and it is sooooooo verrryyyy much fun to help out my neighbors....I choose to believe that they would do the same for me if I needed it. There are so many things in this world that people invest in...just look at the stock markets. I prefer to invest in the world's greatest and most diverse asset....the people. This rocks!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an IT Manager.

lender.name: jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is necessary for me to do so. It is my duty to help whoever I can, and loaning people money is a part of that.
lender.occupational_info: I am in school to become a lawyer.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: It is a very easy way to help and not much makes a big difference for these people.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to provide for themselves and their families, and I am grateful that I can help a litle bit.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a drug company that makes medications for high blood pressure, heart disease, and diabetes. I help the company analyze how our products are performing in the marketplace.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I want to see Kiva succeed at helping others who are less fortunate than we are in North America. Kiva has the power to help so many people. I choose to be part of making this a success. Thank you for the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a great team of talented people at a large company. While doing that I have been priviledged and blessed with a great family. Also, I have been fortunate in learning to write, publishing articles and winning some awards for photography. Canada has provided me with no end of opportunity and experiences. I hope to help others through Kiva. Kiva makes it easy to help others.
